Headline: #55N 55th/Narragansett Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Narragansett/63rd Place
ShortDescription: EB #55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temp rerouted via Narragansett, 65th, Austin, 63rd and Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/63rd Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, 65th, Austin, 63rd and Narragansett, then resume their normal route,  due to street blockage near Narragansett/63rd Place.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at O'Hare
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to unauthorized person on the tracks.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#88 Higgins,

#56 Milwaukee,

#81 Lawrence

and/or #92 Foster.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
